The aim of this script is to remove confidential data from some datasets, to publish public information on the Github repository

## Importing relevant packages

```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = rprojroot::find_rstudio_root_file())
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

library(mapme.biodiversity)
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
library(mapview)
library(magrittr)
library(stargazer)
library(dplyr)
library(openxlsx)
library(writexl)
library(ggplot2)
library(questionr)
library(readxl)
library(data.table)
library(sp)
library(raster)
library(terra)
library(janitor)
library(ARTofR)
```

## Import data to treat

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

data_stat = fread("01_data_tidy/BDD_DesStat.csv")
data_stat_nodupl = fread("01_data_tidy/BDD_DesStat_nodupl.csv")
pa_shp = read_sf("00_data_raw/WDPA_SHP/BDD_SHP_nodupl.shp") %>%
  clean_names()
pa_pfolio_forest = read_sf("01_data_tidy/mapme_bio_data/pa_pfolio_forest.gpkg")
pa_pfolio_emi = read_sf("01_data_tidy/mapme_bio_data/pa_pfolio_emi.gpkg")
pa_pfolio_mang = read_sf("01_data_tidy/mapme_bio_data/pa_pfolio_mang.gpkg")
```

## List of public, relevant variables

```{r}
list_var_PA_open = c("id_projet", "nom_du_projet", "nom_ap", "id_concours", 
                "wdpaid", "wdpaid_2", "wdpaid_3", "wdpa_pid",
                "pays", "iso3", "direction_regionale", "annee_octroi",
                "cofinancier_1", "cofinancier_2", "cofinancier_3", 
                "cofinancier_4", "cofinancier_5", "cofinancier_6",
                "afd", "afd_bin", "kfw_bin", "ffem_bin", "cofin_other",
                "cofin_unkwn", "nb_ap_nombre_potentiel", "detail",
                "iucn_cat", "iucn_des", "marine", "superficie",
                "status", "status_yr", "gov_type","own_type", "mang_auth")

list_var_shp_conf = c("mntnt", "mtglb", "e", "mnt", "prodt", "lbllp",
                      "rspns", "dr", "detal", "projt", "cmmnt")

```

## Create public datasets

```{r}
data_stat_pub = data_stat %>%
  dplyr::select(all_of(list_var_PA_open))
#fwrite(data_stat_pub, "01_data_tidy/BDD_DesStat_pub.csv")

data_stat_nodupl_pub = data_stat_nodupl %>%
  dplyr::select(all_of(list_var_PA_open))
#fwrite(data_stat_nodupl_pub, "01_data_tidy/BDD_DesStat_nodupl_pub.csv")

pa_shp_open = pa_shp %>%
  dplyr::select(-all_of(list_var_shp_conf))
st_write(pa_shp_open,
        dsn = "01_data_tidy/BDD_SHP_nodupl_pub.gpkg",
        delete_dsn = TRUE)

pa_pfolio_forest_pub = pa_pfolio_forest %>%
  dplyr::select(-all_of(list_var_shp_conf))
# st_write(pa_pfolio_forest_pub,
#         dsn = "01_data_tidy/mapme_bio_data/pa_pfolio_forest_pub.gpkg",
#         delete_dsn = TRUE)

pa_pfolio_emi_pub = pa_pfolio_emi %>%
  dplyr::select(-all_of(list_var_shp_conf))
# st_write(pa_pfolio_emi_pub,
#         dsn = "01_data_tidy/mapme_bio_data/pa_pfolio_emi_pub.gpkg",
#         delete_dsn = TRUE)

pa_pfolio_mang_pub = pa_pfolio_mang %>%
  dplyr::select(-all_of(list_var_shp_conf))
```
